subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: When Rangers Coach John Tortorella and Devils Coach Peter DeBoer were jawing at each other during Game 4 on Monday night, no one had a better listening post than NBC’s Pierre McGuire.
snippet: When Rangers Coach John Tortorella and Devils Coach Peter DeBoer were jawing at each other during Game 4 on Monday night, no one had a better listening post than NBC’s Pierre McGuire.
